description:
KaOS Linux 2025.01 independent distribution is now available for download with the KDE Plasma 6.2 desktop environment and Linux kernel 6.12 LTS. Here's what's new!

The post KaOS Linux 2025.01 Released with Linux Kernel 6.12 LTS and KDE Plasma 6.2 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KaOS Linux 2025.01 Released with Linux Kernel 6.12 LTS and KDE Plasma 6.2

description:
System76’s Meerkat mini Linux PC is now available to order with Intel Core Ultra processors, up to 62% faster RAM, and other updates.

The post System76’s Meerkat Mini Linux PC Is Back with Intel Core Ultra CPUs and Faster RAM appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: System76’s Meerkat Mini Linux PC Is Back with Intel Core Ultra CPUs and Faster RAM
